events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but the shipment still hasn’t arrived. The tracking number shows no update for days.
The reported issue about the order not arriving on time has been classified under Delivery Delay for proper handling.
Your case has been forwarded to our delivery support team who will assist you shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll help you track this down and update you as soon as possible.
Could you please confirm your order number and the shipping address to verify the delivery status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 742 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield.
We checked with the courier and your package was delayed due to unforeseen logistics issues. It should arrive within the next 3 days; we will expedite the handling.
Thank you for the update, I appreciate the explanation and look forward to receiving the package soon.
We’re happy to inform you that your order has now been successfully delivered as of today. Please confirm once you’ve received it.
Just checking in to make sure that your delivery arrived in good condition and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything looks great. Thanks for your help resolving the delay!
We’re glad your delivery issue is fully resolved. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime for further assistance.
